item.title: Developer
item.description: Architecture overview Ernest is based on a microservice oriented architecture. The majority of the services are built using Go, however we still need to maintain some jruby based in order to interact with vCloud. Naming conventions In order to keep it clean there are some naming conventions you need to follow in order to understand Ernest Service Naming Every service family follows an easy to understand naming convention. Connectors A connector name will look like component-action-provider-component.
